creditline: Gift of LeRoy and Cathie Draine in appreciation of Nigerian art and culture
description: pillar-like abstracted human forms standing in tiers at R with hands extended in offering; central figure facing L holding two staffs in hands; four totem-like figures at L, under snakelike figure with 8 heads; bright red-orange background
signed: lower margin, in pencil: Izobo (Red base) | -Deep etching | Bruce Onobrakpeya | Sept 1971
title: Izobo (Red Base)
